title: Wallace SGC 60 Sovereign 150 For Sale or Trade
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: Wallace SGC 60 Sovereign 150 For Sale or Trade
posts.post_content: Here is a Wallace Sovereign 150 for sale. It is graded an SGC 60. It looks great and has the Sovereign 150 which is the tougher of the two Sovereign backs. The price is 395.00 paypal f and f or by check. I am also open to trades for other t206 or tobacco era cards that are of similar value

[quote name="ricktmd" post=1671708]Here is a Wallace Sovereign 150 for sale. It is graded an SGC 60. It looks great and has the Sovereign 150 which is the tougher of the two Sovereign backs. The price is 425.00 paypal f and f or by check. I am also open to trades for other t206 or tobacco era cards that are of similar value[/QUOTE]

Nice card Rick...
